summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty Freee.l.f.'s Power Grip Primer is available in a jumbo size for 3x the makeup stick at a price that's epic. It locks down your makeup for long-lasting wear while hydrating and smoothing the look of skin. The sticky gel formula is infused with Hyaluronic acid and leaves your skin with that dewy look.
details: DetailsBenefitsOMG! $30 value!Jumbo size, fan-fave Power Grip PrimerHydrating gel face primer delivers major makeup stick for long-lasting wearApplies clear with a dewy finish that works on all skin tonesInfused with Hyaluronic acidGreat for dry, oily & combination skine.l.f. is double-certified cruelty-free by Leaping Bunny & PETAe.l.f. is proud to partner with Fair Trade USA & manufacture products in Fair Trade Certified facilities; look for the Fair Trade Certified seal on your e.l.f. productFeaturesCollect all 22 different packaging designs, featuring names picked by youFormulated WithoutPhthalatesParabensNonylphenol ethoxylatesTriclosanTriclocarbanItem 2639297How To UseApply evenly to face before makeup using your fingertips to pat into skin. The warmth of your fingers will help the product melt into skin for even application. Allow 30 seconds to set before applying makeup.External use only. Stop use if irritation occurs.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, PEG-150 Distearate, Polysorbate 80, Niacinamide, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Water, Melissa Officinalis Flower/Leaf/Stem Water, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Water, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Menthol, Pentylene Glycol, Propylene Glycol, PEG-240/HDI Copolymer Bis Decyltetradeceth-20 Ether, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Trideceth-9, 1,2-Hexanediol MAY CONTAIN: Blue 1 (CI 42090), Yellow 5 (CI 19140) Ingredients may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the packaging of the product you receive for the list of ingredients in your particular product.
how_to_use: Apply evenly to face before makeup using your fingertips to pat into skin. The warmth of your fingers will help the product melt into skin for even application. Allow 30 seconds to set before applying makeup.External use only. Stop use if irritation occurs.

reviews.headline: Best affordable primer
reviews.comments:
This is definitely the best face primer for the price. So glad to see that it comes in the larger size!
Now elf needs to make the setting spray in a larger size while keeping the price point down. 
Elf has some amazing products and this is one if them! 
I never have to touch-up my makeup!
Makeup looks good all day long!

reviews.headline: Doesn't do much for me
reviews.comments: I sweat a lot throughout the day and wear baseball caps. This did nothing for logetivity. My makeup was melting and smudging within an hour of sweating.

media.headline: Game-Changing Power Grip Primer!
media.caption: Jumbo Power Grip Primer for the win!! After a full day of wear, my makeup stayed flawless.

media.headline: The BEST Primer for a Dewy Finish & All-Day Wear!
media.caption: my fact after an 8 hour shift, all thanks to Powergrip!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I was gifted e.l.f.'s new Jumbo Power Grip Primer in exchange for my honest review. I'm officially obsessed with the e.l.f. Jumbo Power Grip Primer. I've used a lot of primers in the past, but this one truly stands out! First off, the formula is SO hydrating and smooth. It has a lovely, gel-like texture that glides onto the skin effortlessly and leaves it feeling plump and prepped for makeup.

What I love most about this primer is how incredibly 'sticky' it is (in the best way possible). It creates the perfect base for my foundation to stick to, ensuring that my makeup stays put all day long without any creasing or fading. No touch-ups neededâ€”my makeup stays flawless from morning until night!

The Power Grip aspect is no joke. It gives me that smooth, glass-like finish while keeping my skin feeling moisturized but not greasy. My foundation applies beautifully over it, blending in easily and looking more radiant than ever. Plus, it doesn't feel heavy or tacky, which is a huge win for me.

Another major bonus: this primer is a steal! For such a high-performance product, the price is ridiculously affordable, and the Jumbo size gives you so much product for the money. It's the perfect primer for both everyday wear and special occasions.

In short: e.l.f. Jumbo Power Grip Primer is a must-have in my makeup kit. It smooths, hydrates, and grips like a dream, giving my makeup longevity and a flawless finish. If you haven't tried it yet, you're seriously missing out. Trust me, your makeup routine will never be the same again!

Highly recommend! ðŸ’¯âœ¨
faceoff_positive.headline: Game-Changing Power Grip Primer!

faceoff_negative.comments:
**I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest review**

When this primer works, it sure works! It's very sticky and holds onto my makeup much longer than without it. It also gives a nice cooling and refreshing feeling which makes it perfect for the summer; however, sometimes the stickiness only works in spots on my face, not all over. Because of this, my foundation ends up patchy and clinging onto little spots, making it look like I didn't fully blend it.

I get the hype over this product because it definitely does the job well, but it's not consistent.
faceoff_negative.headline: Great 50% of the time
